amendment.description: To create a new 2-year term of service for the Director of the Federal Bureau of Investigation.

vote.text: Amendment SA 579 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 579 proposed by Senator Reid for Senator Coburn. (consideration: CR S4780-4781; text: CR S4780) To create a new 2-year term of service for the Director of the Federal Bureau of Investigation.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 579 proposed by Senator Reid for Senator Coburn.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 579 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
